summary.span: 表示具有固定精度和小数位数的数值，该数值介于 - 10^38 +1 和 10^38 - 1 之间。

span.span: Represents a numeric value between - 10^38 +1 and 10^38 - 1, with fixed precision and scale.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 具有与其相应的 .NET Framework 数据类型不同的基础数据结构。 has different underlying data structures from its corresponding .NET Framework data type. 没有精度的概念。 has no concept of precision. 它使用3个字节来存储实际数据，因此，最大比例为28。It uses 3 bytes to store the actual data, and therefore has a maximum scale of 28. 数据范围为-79228162514264337593543950335 到79228162514264337593543950335。The data range is -79,228,162,514,264,337,593,543,950,335 through 79,228,162,514,264,337,593,543,950,335. 具有精度和小数位数。 has both precision and scale. 它使用4个无符号4字节整数来存储实际数据，因此，最大精度和小数位数为38。It uses 4 unsigned 4-byte integers to store the actual data, and therefore has maximum precision and scale of 38. 数据范围为-10 ^ 38 + 1 到 10 ^ 38-1。The data range is - 10^38 +1 through 10^38 - 1.
